title: FS: T206 Bowerman - missing red ink - SOLD
author: atx840

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Bowerman - missing red ink - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I'm listing this as possibly missing the red ink layer. As seen in other "official" slabbed examples there is a slight pink hue ink layer where the red "B" should be.

Unfortunately I can not guarantee that if regraded with the proper form submission to label as missing ink that PSA or SGC will do so.

SOLD

Sweet card, Chris...congrats on the sale!
